item.title: How to Learn Linux
item.description: This article gives you the resources on how to learn Linux. If I am missing a resource, be sure and comment so I can add it.

item.title: Why should I switch to Linux from Windows?
item.description: This will be the first article in a series of Linux articles, I am going over 6 reasons to switch to Linux and 1 big reason not to. Many people ask “Why should I switch to Linux from Windows?” and in this article below I break it down for you.
